attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i believe that national service should be broughtback to the uk , as you can clearly see in the programme "bad lads army" that this has in 95% of cases had a posititive effect on these young mens life , it will give them a trade , teach them self dicipline and also keep them out of trouble ! once they have completed there service they will be of value to socitey
